subtitle: Your Personal Link Hub
footer_about: Link234 is your all-in-one platform to share and manage multiple links effortlessly. Connect your social media, websites, and services in a single, easy-to-access profile. Simplify your digital presence and reach your audience with just one link!
mail_list_text: Sign up for our newsletter to recieve latests updates, discounts and much more.
mail_list_consent: By signing up I agree to the Privacy policy and Terms & conditions.

hero.title: Create Your Personalized Bio Link
hero.subtext: Share your social media, websites, product catalogues and more with one simple link.

Catalogue.title: Products, Services or any Catalogue
Catalogue.subtext: Add as many catalogues of your shop, products, or services to your profile. Share your bio link, and let your customers find all your digital data in one place.

features.title: Link234 - Connect All Your Links
features.social_integration: Social Integration – Connect all your accounts & platforms.
features.custom_links: Custom Links – Organize everything in one profile.
features.qr_codes: Links / QR Codes – Quick sharing via scannable codes.

visibility.title: Increase your visibility with Link234, share all your digital data in one place.
